page.title: 13Recreation in Brinklow.
page.content: There are a variety of clubs available in Brinklow.{For young folk:}Beavers Cubs, Scouts, Brownies,Guides,Youth Club,Mother & Baby Club and Playgroup. Some children take part in piano lessons,off-road motorcycling,and horse riding,but have to travel outside Brinklow for swimming,ballet and gymnastics.The village supports many activities{for adults,}these are: British Legion,Folk/Jazz Clubs Choir, W.I.,M.U.,Football,Cricket, Allotments Association, W.R.V.S. Luncheon Club, Senior Citizens Club, Women's Fellowship,Oddfellows and Womens' Glade.{Popular pastimes}include reading T.V.,gardening,walking, music, fishing, knitting and bird watching. {Favourite walks}include the boat yard, tump,canal,playing fields,All Oaks Lane ,and the Bridlepath to Binley.
